title: Everyday people (TEFC)
creator_credit: Del Peterson, Dan Peterson and WHA-TV Channel 21, University of Wisconsin
brief_description: A look at the St Francis Children’s Activity and Education Centre in Milwaukee which trains handicapped children to realise their full potential. Suitable for teachers.
